Transmission: Automatic (TC) - 8 Gears, Paddle Shift, Sport Mode
Engine: 3996 cc, 8 Cylinders In V Shape, 4 Valves/Cylinder, DOHC
Suspension - Front: Air suspension with continuous damping control and 4 height settings
Suspension - Rear: Air suspension with continuous damping control and 4 height settings
Airbags: 6 Airbags (Driver, Front Passenger, 2 Curtain, Driver Side, Front Passenger Side)
Front AC: Two Zones, Individual Fan Speed Controls
Rear AC: Separate Zone, Vents Behind Front Armrest, Common Fan Speed Control
Adjustment Options - Driver Seat: 16 way electrically adjustable with 2 memory presets (seat forward / back, backrest tilt forward / back, headrest up / down, seat height up / down, lumbar up / down, lumbar forward / back, extended thigh support forward / back, shoulder support bolsters in / out)
Adjustment Options - Front Passanger Se: 16 way electrically adjustable with 2 memory presets (seat forward / back, backrest tilt forward / back, headrest up / down, seat height up / down, lumbar up / down, lumbar forward / back, extended thigh support forward / back, shoulder support bolsters in / out)
Fog Lamps: LED on front, Halogen on rear
Interior Colour(s): Beluga, Cricket Ball, Imperial Blue, Newmarket Tan, Porpoise
